description: Costco always offers a little extra...
maintext:
Nathan Coleman was shopping at Costco in Halifax on Friday when he and his daughter got home to find a living scorpion. It was sealed inside the bag of bananas which were imported from Guatemala.
He personally delivered the scorpion to its new home at the Nova Scotia Museum of Natural History.
title: WATCH: Live Scorpion Found with Bananas from Costco
